item.title: VB .NET find form in a MDI parent for using a mouse position and clicking
item.dc:creator: @kloplop321 kloplop321
item.description:
@kloplop321 wrote:

Follow the rules. That was not supportive. I use VB .NET, I have spent 2 months on this client, In VB .NET So dont tell me to lower myself down to something that was made in 2000. Otherwise post what would help, not tell me to go do something else. If you will actualy bother to help, find code that will find a picture and return the coordinates of where it is. That would be usefull.

Read full topic
